head.title: Clean Metadata in {{FileFormatUp}} Using {{ProgLang}}
head.description: Use {{ProdFullName}} to delete or update hidden metadata in {{FileFormatUp}} files. Remove private info before sharing your documents.

header.title: Remove Metadata from {{FileFormatUp}} Files with {{EnvNameShort}}
header.description: Keep personal and business info safe in your {{FileFormatUp}} files using {{ProgLang}}. Simple tools that help protect your data.

content.title: Get started with {{ProdShortName}} to protect metadata in your {{EnvName}} projects.
content.step_1: Set up a {{textRedactor}} and open your {{FileFormatCap}} file.
content.step_2: Choose to delete all metadata fields.
content.step_3: Run the redaction to clear hidden data.
content.step_4: Save the file with metadata removed.

example_bottom.title: Clear Hidden Metadata
example_bottom.content: This example shows how to change or delete metadata in {{FileFormatUp}} files.

more_features.title: Remove Sensitive Info from Files
more_features.description: {{ProdFullName}} lets you clean up private content in different document formats. Keep your files secure and easy to share.

feature_1.title: Text Redaction
feature_1.content: Find and delete personal or sensitive words in your documents.

feature_2.title: Cover Images
feature_2.content: Place overlays on images to hide private visuals.

feature_3.title: Metadata Removal
feature_3.content: Erase hidden metadata that could leak private information.

about.title: About {{ProdFullName}}
about.content: {{ProdShortName}} gives {{ProgLang}} developers tools to hide text, image content, and metadata in {{FileFormatUp}} documents.
